lead_paragraph: The eventing pony Theodore O’Connor was euthanized after an accident at the barn of the equestrians Karen and David O’Connor in northern Virginia. The O’Connors said in a statement that Theodore O’Connor, a 13-year-old gelding, bolted and slipped running back to the barn, severely cutting his hind leg and severing tendons and ligaments.
